body.name: Jekayla Heavy Duty Broom, 56-Inch Long Handle, Perfect for Outdoor and Indoor Use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 39 mins
features: HEAVY DUTY: This is a professional quality broom. The handle is made from solid metal, not wood, and is coated in a beautiful, non-slip black finish. The bristles are thick and sturdy, and will not bend or break under normal use.

VERSATILE: This broom can be used for a variety of tasks, both inside and outside your home. Use it to sweep up leaves, dirt, and debris in your yard. Or, use it to keep your garage, workshop, or basement clean. The angled bristles make it easy to get into tight spaces, and the sturdy handle provides a comfortable grip.
DURABLE: This broom is built to last. The metal handle is sturdy and durable, and the bristles are made from high-quality materials that will not fall out or break easily.
EASY TO STORE: This broom features a unique hanging hole on the back of the handle. This allows you to store the broom vertically, which takes up less space than a traditional broom.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are confident that you will love our heavy-duty broom. However, if you are not satisfied with your purchase, simply contact us and we will refund your money or replace your broom.
body.description: Jekayla is a professional manufacturer of home cleaning tools. We have been committed to providing customers with high quality and cost-effective cleaning tools. This heavy duty broom is made from high quality metal and plastic. The metal frame is strong enough to hold up daily heavy use, and won't break or deform easily. The bristles are not easy to fall out and can be used for a long time. The bristles are tightly attached to the brush and won't fall off. This angle broom is designed to reach under furniture easily, and the angle of the broom head can be adjusted from 0 to 90 degrees, so you can easily clean under furniture, and the broom head can also rotate, which makes cleaning more convenient. The handle is made of high quality metal and is not easy to break. It is coated with anti-slip rubber, which can effectively increase friction and prevent hand fatigue. This heavy duty broom is perfect for cleaning large areas such as gardens, parking lots, warehouses, factories and indoor areas. The broom head is 13 inches wide and the total length of the broom is 56 inches. The bristles are stiff enough to sweep away dust, dirt, debris, pet hair and other small particles. This heavy duty broom is an excellent choice for your daily cleaning work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My housekeeper loves, loves, loves this broom. She says so every time she uses it!
reviews.reviewText: Makes me feel good to keep my housekeeper happy by providing high-quality tools that make her job easier to do while holding to my ridiculous standards of clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This broom is much sturdier than I expected. Good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very wide brush
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad broom per se but brush is very wide and hard to get in smaller areas (think under chairs) and handle comes unscrewed easily. Would be an excellent outdoor broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excuse the blackness BUT GET THE BROOM!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very effect , gets the job done , it’s not heavy at all , it’s quit medium rate , it kinda unscrews when sweeping but I don’t think I tightened it very good so that maybe on me , but get this broom !
